name: 100% Cotton Back Ribbon Tiered Dress (Black)
description: A natural texture that accentuates the loveliness of adulthood. An elegant tiered dress that allows you to enjoy the relaxed trend.

name: Light Stretch Cutsew (Navy)
description: A cutsew with a comfortable fit and a supple touch. A basic design that can be used for both business casual and everyday wear.

name: Belted Denim Pants (Blue)
description: A stylish item that adds a feminine belt to classic denim pants. Easy to match with both casual and clean looks.

name: Lace Flare Skirt (White)
description: A lace skirt that exudes an elegant atmosphere. Lined to reduce transparency, a recommended item for all seasons.
